::Zardus::

Zardus nods, looking at Lady Hawk. Something about her felt strange, 
like she was hiding something...

"I'll advise you to be more careful in the future," he says, "Outside 
rank means very little on this planet. A simple Predacon could 
easilly become ruler of a giant faction. I'll show you to the lab, 
but be careful. The ship will be watching you closely."

He turns around, motioning for Lady Hawk to follow as he walks into 
the ship, heading for the labs.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "Lady Hawk saw Zardus exit the ship "I meant no disrespect towards 
> your lackey she just needed to be educated in manners when 
> associating with higher stature." she could tell by the way Zardus 
> carried himself that he was a bot who wasn't impressed easily. "If 
> you would show me to one of your labs I'll demonstrate some of my 
> findings." she'd hoped that he wasn't a scientist or he might see 
> through her deception and know that she was usingsomeone elses 
> technology.
